Title: Relates to pretrial mental health and substance abuse evaluations and treatment for certain defendants and establishes the pretrial mental health and substance abuse services bail fund
Summary: Relates to pretrial mental health and substance abuse evaluations and treatment for certain defendants; establishes the pretrial mental health and substance abuse services bail fund.
LawCode: Amd §§550.10 & 150.20, add §520.50, CP L; add §99-qq, St Fin L
